thread.section_title: Vision Direct Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vision Direct Australia | www.visiondirect.com.au
thread.title: Carl
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Carl

author: Carl
title: Carl
text: When I first put my order in I was wondering if it would take a few days or months before the contacts arrived. I was pleased to receive a tracking number almost immediately and the lenses arrived within four days from order. They had a wide range of products on the site and I wouldn't hesitate from ordering more contacts from Vision Direct.
